Two new maps plus an updated Erlengrat map will allow for different kinds of farming operations. More than 400 machines and tools from more than 100 authentic agricultural brands including new machine categories will make agriculture, animal husbandry and forestry even more fun than ever.

name: Extortion
summary: You're a computer engineer with a terrible secret. Someone is blackmailing you and now, you have to hack some servers and get secret files for him. Would you succeed to achieve his missions or would you find him and revenge ?

name: Tears of Themis
summary:
As a new attorney at law, how will you solve a series of mysterious cases? Which of the four unique male leads is your destiny?

The player is a rookie attorney in the city of Stellis, working hard at a law firm under the careful eye of her mentor. After proving herself through a series of cases, her mentor invites her to join a special taskforce designated with investigation into a series of mysterious crimes related to tampering with an individual's mental state. The mysteries they unravel as well as the relationships formed between the player and the rest of the team form the emotional core of the story.

name: Chernobyl Liquidators Simulator
summary:
The Chernobyl Liquidators were the civil and military personnel who were conscripted to deal with consequences of the 1986 Chernobyl nuclear disaster.

Chernobyl Liquidators Simulator is a realistic take on the disaster, where you will NOT fight mutants and monsters, instead work hard to contain the radiation, help the people and conspire with the government.

name: Ambardia
summary: Ambardia is a third-person MMORPG set in an ancient fantasy realm with evolving complex lore and quest-driven gameplay. Class-free character development allows players to craft their own destiny as they choose a path between Order and Creativity or Chaos and Destruction!

name: Wasco
summary: Wasco is an RPG about the futuristic adventures of Wasco, the waste collecting robot! Play through an hour-long adventure that mimics the old but gold JRPG mechanics and brings a cyberpunked pixel art inspired by our favorite retro games to your device.

name: Gunner, HEAT, PC!
summary: GHPC is an armored vehicle simulation game under development by an independent team. It focuses on the fighting machines of the late Cold War and the modern era. It blends detailed simulation of gunnery and ballistics with simplified controls.

name: FiveM
summary: FiveM is a modification for Grand Theft Auto V enabling you to play multiplayer on customized dedicated servers, powered by Cfx.re.

name: Towelket: One More Time 3 (Karaage Tanpopo)
summary: Towelket: One More Time 3 is a story-heavy adventure/role-playing game made in RPG Maker 2000.

name: Operation Airsoft
summary: Operation Airsoft was developed for people who can't play airsoft, or someone who would like to train for a event coming up, development started during a time where no one could play, and now people can get their fix for airsoft without losing interest.

name: Ember Knights
summary: Ember Knights is a fast-paced multiplayer rogue-lite. Build powerful and unique attack synergies on every run by customizing your loadout through weapon upgrade perks, stackable combat and magic skills and game-changing relics. Local and online co-op for 1-4 players!

name: Blast Brigade vs. the Evil Legion of Dr. Cread
summary: Blast Brigade is a colorful 2D action-adventure that combines intense platformer gameplay with metroidvania exploration. Assemble the team of superspies and run’n’gun through a tainted paradise island to take down the evil genius Dr. Cread and his army of monsters.

name: A Glimpse Of Luna
summary: "A Glimpse Of Luna" is a tactical battle card game, which combines elements like movement, range and troop strength to make the game very dynamic and strategic.

name: One in a Trillion
summary:
Start your adventure to beat the odds and find the rarest eggs in the world!

One in a Trillion is a relaxing clicker game where you are challenged with finding all of our ultra-rare eggs. From eggs that only appear once every 250 taps to the insane golden egg that has a one in a trillion chance of appearing!

It’s not just a case of tapping away and hoping for the best – some eggs momentarily appear on the screen and you must quickly click on them before they’re gone again.

Every tap comes with a one in a thousand chance of starting an egg hunt. You have ten seconds to quickly hunt down the egg’s location on the screen! These eggs are often found in a dirty condition and require cleaning before you can see how rare it is, but they come with the added bonus of having a rarity rating – providing you with more chances of having a super rare egg.

You may not always find a cute egg but no tap is without it’s reward, you’ll continuously be earning money which you can spend in the shop to speed up egg cleaning or increase it’s chance of being rare.

You can also raise funds by selling eggs that you’ve already found. Work your way towards increasing your money and being able to buy the possibility of even rarer eggs.

Once an egg is clean, watch it’s slow reveal and wait in anticipation to see just how rare your egg is!

One in a Trillion is an idle tapper game that will keep you busy for many hours.

name: Cyjin: The Cyborg Ninja
summary:
Use only your mouse to beat this difficult platformer!

Cyjin: The Cyborg Ninja is a unique precision platformer featuring fast-paced gameplay with accelerated dashing action. The game is simple to pick up, yet challenging to master. Take control of the cyborg ninja -- use only your mouse to take on tough enemies and hellish levels.

You'll have to be a true ninja with lightning reflexes to beat this game. During your journey, you will face many challenges that will push your gaming skill to the limit -- and you'll do it with only your mouse! It's not just the lasers obstructing the path or the deadly spikes, but also the army of hostile yōkai-inspired robots that will try to kill you before you take the next step! Can you find your way out of these dangerous, enemy-infested mazes in one piece? Get your mouse ready to help Cyjin defeat the fearsome Shōgun!

Game Features:

Unique Mouse-based Twitch Control - Experience one of the most unique gameplay with mouse-based precision platforming. Master how you twitch your mouse to get Cyjin into lightning action. Using your ninja-fast mouse skill, overcome challenges of all kinds created by our crazy developers.

Accelerated Dashing Action - Take control of your cyborg ninja in accelerated dashing action, and strike your enemies. A fun way to crush your enemies with speedy destruction.

Swift and Precise Platforming - Aim with your mouse to target your path and landing. Manage your precision and timing to pass through tricky obstacles.

Exciting Bosses - Our developers have prepared intense bosses of all sizes that will stomp whoever challenges them. Get yourself ready for exciting boss fights that will challenge your precision, speed and skill!

2D Oriental Cyberpunk - Savour the rich world of Cyjin, blending oriental inspiration with cyberpunk theme. Adventure through different areas, from the deep wasteland of the Junkyard, to the industrial grime of the Automation Factory, and the traditional futurism of the Urbanscape. All combined into a platformer and a retro atmosphere.

Challenging Puzzles - Each level contains puzzles which will require quick thinking and ninja-fast timing to navigate. Can you solve them with the limited time you have?

Beat this game with just your mouse, only then you can be a true ninja.

name: Intellivision Collection 2
summary:
We are delighted to announce the first of two Intellivision Collection cartridges for the Evercade.

This will be followed by Intellivision Collection 2 with more great games from this classic system in 2022! Here’s a rundown of what to expect on Intellivision Collection 1. Don’t forget to let us know your thoughts on social media!

name: Dark Deity
summary: Command legendary heroes to reshape a land fractured by broken oaths, reckless war, and a secret search for arcane power. The ancient artifacts and powerful weapons you discover will empower your cast of 30 playable characters as they form bonds and battle their way into legend.

name: INTERASTRA
summary: INTERASTRA is a fully immersive science fiction survival adventure game set in outer space. Discover unknown planets differing in weather conditions, gravity, and resources. Craft necessary equipment, launch and control space rockets, explore the universe and survive among the stars.

name: Forgotten Hope
summary:
Forgotten Hope is a short, first-person narrative-driven video game presented through the eyes of a teenage girl who is trying to reconnect with her past to find answers.

Our protagonist lives in a rural village, and she wakes up in a cave with no memory of who she is and how she got there. She needs to find her way out of the cave and walk around the countryside to find places to regain her lost memories - and figure out what exactly happened to her.

name: Against the Storm
summary: A roguelite city builder set in a fantasy world tormented by the everlasting rain. Settle the unknown wilds to discover and rebuild the ruins of a long-forgotten civilization. Develop technologies that will help your citizens tackle destructive storms and extend the frontier of your civilization.

name: Triglav
summary:
The tower of Triglav consisting of 50+ floors. Go for the top floor where the princess is captured, by searching for keys that open the doors to the next floor, by solving puzzles, and by monster hunting.
In this unique world created by richly detailed retro pixel art, create your own unique character by combining items of over 2,500 types.

This is a smartphone version of the hack and slash type RPG released as an indie web game in 2002 and has been played by over 500,000 players.
Many audio and visual effects, such as sound effects and music, have been added which were not included in the original version.

name: Ayakashi Akashi
summary:
Enju Yoinara is a middle school teacher at the small, rural Yusei Junior High.
A strange encounter one rainy morning is quickly forgotten as the rest of the day goes by without incident.
But the next day, tragedy strikes in his classroom, and a very bizarre mystery begins to unfold...

name: Pandorex
summary: Pandorex is a Point & Click Adventure featuring Harry who is on a mission to find his lost dog.

name: Oversight
summary: A turn-based espionage strategy game where two players compete to securely deliver intelligence via a network of secret agents.

name: Mind Lock
summary: Enter this crafting-driven metroidvania to plunge deep into your imagination. You must craft spells to defeat monsters plaguing your mind, and explore a dreamscape to unlock the skills needed to defeat your nemesis.

name: schoolbreak.io
summary:
Schoolbreak.io is a fun online multiplayer game about students trying to create as much chaos as possible in school and teachers trying to save the school!

Once the break starts, it's your task as a student to produce as much chaos as possible to drive the chaos level up. When the level reaches 100%, the students win and the teachers get fired!

If you play as a teacher, your job is to protect the school - try to catch the students in the act and get them detention! But be careful, if you get it wrong you have to explain yourself to their parents!

Decide - Will you save the school or devastate it?

name: Hellborne
summary:
Hellborne is a new free-to-play WWII game that combines FPS and RTS mechanics with tank and plane battles. Built with Unreal Engine 4 and entirely community-funded. Currently in pre-alpha.

In Hellborne, every battle counts. Your wins and losses truly affect the outcome of an all out strategic war. Just choose a side, which nation you want to represent and get to battle!

The game takes part during the late stages of war, giving you access to a vast selection of weaponry and equipment used during World War II. You can take part in the war as a solo soldier or with your squad, or by controlling your army and sending resources directly to your comrades.

name: ForeVR Bowl
summary:
“ForeVR Bowl is the best bowling game of all time” -Vicki P, Mother of the Game Designer

Game night is back like never before! Take your pick from over six alleys (1990’s hall, the Moon, Tiki Island, and more!) and have a blast with friends and family in an experience like no other in VR. Bowl solo or invite a crew to join in an immersive landscape complete with unique soundtrack and fun easter eggs. Enjoy casual competition or join the tournament ranks unlocking over 100 collectable balls, each with its own unique throwing style and just a little bit of spice.

ForeVR Bowl is designed as an incredible bowling simulator thanks to a cutting edge game engine and Real Feel Throw technology to recreate everything you’d expect in your local alley... without having to rent any smelly bowling shoes.

Whether you just want to bowl with a few friends, throw down with a full-on tournament or just hang out on the moon, ForeVR Bowl is the best bowling simulator on Earth.

Game on!

name: Breakwaters
summary: In the oceans depths lies the key to defeating Titans and bringing calm to the waves. Sail the waters to find new islands with resources to build, craft, and survive.

name: One More Island
summary: As the Queen's latest governor, build a colonial empire in Her name. Claim islands, collect their natural resources, build production chains, and turn a primitive outpost into a rebellious, bustling metropolis at the heart of a New World commercial empire!

name: Comic 5trike
summary:
Save the world using superpowers while fighting hordes of enemies with your friends!

5 friends get themselves tangled in a fight against a crazy doctor, a girl that can control black holes, and hordes of robots hunting for the same beings that gave the kids their superpowers.

name: Jetborne Racing
summary: Put your flight skills to the test in the online multiplayer air racing game from the creator of VTOL VR. Pilot a high performance jet through challenging courses in a race to the finish. Fly in VR or on desktop with either virtual or physical HOTAS. Do you have what it takes for a podium position?

name: Lifeflame Compendium
summary: Lifeflame Compendium is a WarBreedFarm RPG, farm crops, breed animals and wage war or peace in an expansive open world adventure.

name: The Tower of Wowers
summary: Climb your way across 60+ floors with hand drawn enemies and some banging music in this comedic RPG by NecroCatic Games.

name: Ultimate Rivals: The Court
summary: Ultimate Rivals: The Court is an action-packed basketball arcade sports game bringing 140+ superstars together in a digital world in the near future. Powerhouse squads consisting of athletes from the NHL, NBA, MLB, WNBA, NFL Players Association, and US women’s soccer national team go head-to-head in 3-on-3 games with tons of above-the-rim acrobatics. The game includes top athletes ranging from all-time greats like Wayne Gretzky to sports biggest stars like Alex Morgan. In addition, WWE Superstars will join the roster in future updates including Roman Reigns, Charlotte Flair, and Dwayne Johnson (The Rock).

name: Arsène Lupin: Gentleman Bomber
summary:
Back in 1905 one of the most prolific, daring and dazzling thief was starting his career. He is none other than Arsène Lupin, the gentleman thief.
This is his untold story, a story of bold action, disguise and thievery.
Embody 8 of the most iconic characters of the series, and if you're lucky, you'll discover some hidden gems. Take your character through 6 different maps representing both defining moments of Arsène's story and cultural French beacons. Each level has its own
strong audio theme. Choose among 5 different game modes, each with their own set of objectives and gimmicks representing Arsène's different skills and sides, from gentleman to thief.
In any case, be sure to bomb your opponents before they bomb you!

name: Dungeon Clicker
summary: A 3D Idle Action RPG Clicker

name: DreamHack Beyond
summary:
Welcome to DreamHack Beyond, an at-home, all-digital free interactive experience showcasing the best of DreamHack. Players can dive into the story of the mystical Sleepers by creating their own characters, completing the game’s narrative, looking for side quests and building up their XP, farming for items like Cheer Gear, and more! Want to skip the game and get right to the booth you want? No problem!

DreamHack Beyond can be enjoyed anyway you like. With areas dedicated to game demos, cosplay, tournaments, and more, DreamHack is looking to go BEYOND the creative edge and create a one-of-a-kind online multiplayer experience. Scroll down to read more and join our community pages below for more updates.

name: Magicami
summary: A brand-new turn-based RPG game filled with sexy magical girls! Can you unravel the mysteries? Assist the beautiful Kamisaman in stopping the raging demons and helping to get a world engulfed in chaos back to order and harmony. Every choice you make will bring you one step closer to shaping a brighter future for all.

name: RATOMON
summary: RATOMON is a medieval top-down adventure to stop the Plague. Investigate random generated dungeons, eliminate rat hordes and other villains, who stand behind the disease.

name: Particubes
summary:
Particubes is a free-to-play game creation platform where you can build your own cube-based games, and share them with your friends.

Thanks to its integrated code environment and its voxel editor, you gain the ability to create and edit your games directly on the application, without downloading anything else! Build, test and fix right in the app on your phone or computer.

name: Pro Wrestling Sim
summary: Pro Wrestling Sim is a text-based pro-wrestling booking simulator. Control a wrestling promotion, decide your roster, and create storylines, feuds and matches where the winners and losers are in your hands.

name: Indoorlands
summary: Indoorlands is an amusement park management game where you can control your rides and freely design your halls. Create and expand your individual indoor park to inspire your visitors. Let your creativity run wild, but keep an eye on your finances!

name: Blooming Business: Casino
summary: Design, build & run your own casino, where many drama can arise among your charming animal employees, clients & VIPs.

name: Grow: Song of the Evertree
summary: Grow your own worlds and nurture a deep natural connection with everything they hold. See your actions change the world for better! Bring the Evertree back to life in this breathtaking world-crafting sandbox, with life management and adventure elements.

name: The Chewllers
summary: The Chewllers is an online, multiplayer, VR game. The project presents stylized and comic nature, where 4 players protect the tower from monsters in Co-op mode.

name: Antiprism
summary:
Test your aim and dodging abilities against elite enemies, unique bosses and environmental hazards, as you uncover the secrets of the Antiprism and its connection to the extinct civilization of Arn.
Collect items and credits from your encounters and use them to customize and upgrade parts of your ships - you will need all the firepower you can get in order to reach the end of our pilots' journey.

name: Dungeon Royale
summary: Dungeon Royale is an action-rpg battle-royale with rogue-lite elements. Slay the other adventurers to win the game or die and rebirth as a monster of the dungeon to get your revenge!

name: Outworlder
summary: Outworlder is a sci-fi, sandbox, colony management game with survival elements and direct NPC control. Establish self-sufficient colonies and fulfill the needs of colonists. Engage in physics based gunplay as you travel the stars. Pilot mechs and vehicles, build bases, and interact with wildlife!

name: No Humanity
summary: The genre of the game is bullet hell without shoot'em up, it looks relatively low effort. It's like b-movies, it's so bad it's good. The game design philosophy behind is controlled chaos, if you can't control or learn from randomness, you might have a hard time mastering this very unique game. It also includes a handy map editor, a world explorer full of stuff created by our community, a fun fast paced multiplayer mode and lots of ships and cosmetics to unlock

name: TeamJumpers 2: New Reality
summary:
The ambitious sequel from Imperfect Studios!

TeamJumpers 2: New Reality, is an ambitious sequel to TeamJumpers. And the focus on this one’s theme is interdimensional travel. Every 10 levels, you will discover a new reality. With challenging bosses, a simple yet fun combat system, and secrets to be revealed, this world is yours to explore!

name: Manafinder
summary: Take the role of Lambda as you are exiled from Manahill and thrown into the beautiful but unforgiving world of Aevi in this Japanese-style turn-based pixel-art RPG. Become a manafinder and seek the manastones as you battle against ferocious beasts and other threats as you fight for the survival of the exiles.

name: Honeycomb
summary: Honeycomb is a first-person open-world survival-sandbox where you become a bioengineer. You're going to search for something that can save the Earth, but first, you'll have to save yourself!

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands
summary: Embark on an epic adventure full of whimsy, wonder, and high-powered weaponry! Bullets, magic, and broadswords collide across this chaotic fantasy world brought to life by the unpredictable Tiny Tina.

name: Redfall
summary: Redfall is an open-world co-op FPS from Arkane Austin, the award-winning team behind Prey and Dishonored. Continuing Arkane’s legacy of carefully crafted worlds and love of creative game mechanics, Redfall brings the studio’s signature gameplay to the co-operative action and FPS genres.

name: Wartales
summary: Wartales is an open world RPG in which you lead a group of mercenaries in their search for wealth across a massive medieval universe. Explore the world, recruit companions, collect bounties and unravel the secrets of the tombs of the ancients!

name: Prison Tycoon: Under New Management
summary:
Design, build and run your own prison!

Plan and build your own prison from the ground up! Secure government grants, hire guards and staff and begin welcoming new prisoners in this reboot of the Prison Tycoon franchise.

The goal of a good Warden is not to punish their prisoners, it’s to rehabilitate them into productive members of society. In Under New Management, each inmate must work through their own issues that landed them in prison, and it’s your job to provide them with the help they need to get healthy.

“Prison Tycoon : Under New Management” is looking for a good Warden. Are you up for the job?

name: Counter Punch
summary: A 2D multiplayer online boxing game with quick and fun gameplayer. Host a private or public match to play

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: Ruins of Limis
summary:
Experience the first ever DLC for hit RPG parody The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk!

In Ruins of Limis, the party faces a whole new batch of terrifying enemies, including vampires, zombies, necromancers and… chickens. Expect new missions, challenging battles, side quests, new factions, and fresh laughs, as the unlikely heroes set out to discover the sinister secret of a haunted tavern.

name: Edenbrawl
summary:
Edenbrawl (formerly "Circuits and Shields") combines the action combat of a brawler with the endless depth of a MOBA to create a “Mobrawler”, a unique experience that grips you match 1 and keeps you engaged at match 10,000.

With intense WASD skill-based combat, unique champion playstyles, streamlined player agency, and tactical game modes, Edenbrawl creates an addicting multiplayer experience where no match is like the last.

name: System Under Surveillance
summary: System Under Surveillance (SUS) is an upcoming stealth indie game with adventure and puzzle elements inspired by classic retro games. Take control of Adam and Turbo, and use their vastly different abilities to trick and avoid enemies. SUS is pure stealth at its core, and has no combat system!

name: Empire of Ember
summary: Empire of Ember is an action RPG and strategy game. You play as a Lightbringer, a young wizard who just inherited rule over a destroyed city. You have to rebuild it to its former glory while you live adventures in first-person, dual-wielding steel and magic, exploring procedurally generated dungeons and leading your troops to clashes of up to 100 units. You can customize your city to its finest details with a 3D city-builder, and then upload it for other players to explore and siege.

name: Staroyale
summary: Staroyale is a game of skill, luck, and a game that must be experienced to be fully understood. In Staroyale players pilot their starship in one of several modes, taking on a whole armada of enemy starships. Players must make use of the intuitive controls, upgrade options, skills unique to each starship, and an interactive environment to take down enemy ships or risk being destroyed. Choose a ship and loadout that best suits your play style as each ship comes with its own set of passive and active skills, allowing for different play styles and strategies, with not just one way to victory.

name: Starship Simulator
summary: Step aboard one of the most detailed Starships ever made in this genre-defining space simulation. Serve as part of the crew on mankind's first-ever deep space exploration vessel, where billions of distant uncharted worlds are waiting to inspire, awe, and challenge you. Do you have what it takes?

name: Coin Hunt World!
summary: Coin Hunt is a mobile game that lets you earn crypto while exploring your neighborhood. Discover keys and unlock rewards. Play individually or with a team!

name: Ancient
summary: You find yourself in a world plunged into chaos. Monsters roam this once peaceful land and will hunt down survivors without mercy. Discover shrines to bizarre forgotten gods which can lead to prosperity or annihilation. Even being the survivor that you are, you need not rely only on your agility and skill. Find everything from strange trinkets to powerful relics to give yourself the strength to overcome the obstacles that put themselves before you. But like you, your enemies will gain newfound strength through numerous mutations. May you fall and succumb to the horrors of the land or become triumphant, the fight will always go on…

name: Tag Hop
summary: Tag Hop is a fast-paced PvP bunny hop tag game. Hone your movement skills and compete with your friends, or against other real players! Tag Hop has various duel and team-based game modes, which all incorporate tag!

name: Wonders Of Aether
summary: Wonders of Aether is a free-to-play anime-inspired open-world MMORPG by Japanese developer MEKASMITH.

name: Flowerpatch
summary: An early-access farming mmo about collecting and growing cannabis

name: Ragnarok X: Next Generation
summary: Mobile MMORPG from the Ragnarok Online Franchise developed by Gravity Co.

name: F1 Clash
summary: F1 Clash is a racing management/strategy video game developed and published by Hutch. The game was initially released with the name F1 Manager for both iOS and Android on May 7, 2019. In May 2021 the game was rebranded to F1 Clash and it currently features all the official circuits, teams and drivers from the 2021 Formula One World Championship.

name: Pokémon MMO 3D
summary:
Pokémon MMO 3D is an online multiplayer video game where you can play with your friends in real-time battles.
Play with people from all around the world.
Discover a real-time combat system by controlling your Pokémon.
The addition of the game content is progressive with updates.
Many easter eggs are hidden and different species of pokémon can appear according to the hour and day.

name: Red Colony 2
summary:
The Red Colony is in shambles after the deadly outbreak of the Z-Virus, the only source of life left on Mars is the Blue Colony, which has its own teeth filled problems.

You play as Nicole, a sex worker who has just returned from a secret mission to the Red Colony. On her return, she discovers that the capitalist Blue Colony has also been struck by the Z-Virus and her home in the Colony's Red District is under siege from the zombie hordes.

Nicole only has one option, find her daughter Clementine and escape to Sky City, the home of the Colony's wealthy elite. However, in her quest to find her daughter, she uncovers secrets from her past that come back to haunt her and quickly discovers that zombies aren't the only thing stalking her from the shadows.

Help Nicole solve tricky puzzles, tiptoe her way around zombies and blast the Blue Colony's new apex predator in this solo developed indie game. In addition, feel the anime with game's fully voice acted Japanese dialogue and get to know the quirky characters of the Blue Colony as Red Colony 2 releases soon on Nintendo Switch.

name: Consolation: Board Meeting
summary: A multiplayer party game, with a darker undertone. Traverse a board game board in a board meeting for a chance to be on the board of directors! Welcome to Consolation.

name: Happenlance
summary:
Climb huge mountains, impale hundreds of enemies, and solve tricky physics puzzles... all using only a spear. Pole-vault yourself to victory in this epic joust-'em-up adventure — or face your friends in online co-op and PvP multiplayer!

- Play singleplayer or bring a friend for Sir Happenlance's epic campaign against the monarch!
- Outwit your friends in online PvP with rollback netcode!
- Play in competitive gladiatorial arenas for the ultimate fighting experience!

name: Golfie
summary: Golfie is a completely new way to get that minigolf fix! An innovative mix of roguelite dungeon crawlers, deck builders and of course minigolf sees the player in procedurally generated levels using fun skills, items and effects that put a unique spin on the beloved staple of gaming.

name: Slopecrashers
summary:
Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard fun racing game in which items, stunts & combos are the key to victory.
Pick your animal, grab a board and a hangglider, and hit the slopes. You can ride on your own, battle it out in splitscreen multiplayer, or progress together through the campaign.

name: Battle Ready
summary: Battle Ready is a tactical multiplayer first-person shooter game like no other. Put your skill and teamwork to the test as you battle across vast landscapes, day and night. Are you ready?

name: Space Punks
summary: A top-down looter shooter, Space Punks features crazy, over-the-top action in a unique, irreverent sci-fi setting. Players are given the chance to blast their way to fame, glory and wealth by taking on lucrative contracts on far-flung planets against impossible odds.

name: MergeCrafter
summary:
MergeCrafter is a unique tycoon game where you bring the best talents to unlock and merge on new lands. Play all the puzzles and learn new merge mechanics to discover new Biomes!

Tap, Build & Merge! Lead your empire in the best puzzle game available. Conquer Runaria with your own 3D pixel block simulator!

name: Fadeout: Underground
summary: Fadeout is a Third Person shooter in the vein of classic PC games from the late 90s and early 2000s. Inspired by games like Quake, Unreal Tournament, and Team Fortress with some unique twists.

name: Panic Mode
summary: Panic Mode is a casual puzzle simulation game that puts the player in the position of a crisis manager who needs to save adorable aliens known as Pammies from disasters.

name: Paint Chips
summary:
Paint Chips is a free-to-play online 2D multiplayer top-down shooter where the goal is to paint the ground in as much of your team paint color as you can and to chip your foes with weapons that produce paint. Both paint score and kills are counted toward your total score at the end of each match.

You can group up with up to 7 friends or be randomly teamed up and matched against up to 7 other players to battle across a variety of different maps. Before a quick play match begins you are able to vote for your favorite map and team color. There is also a weekly leaderboard that you could compete with others to reach for a top ten spot each week.

The item shop includes over a hundred different character customization options. You just need to earn the in-game currency called Chips by playing matches and completing daily challenges to be able to purchase your favorite items in the Item Shop. You can also spend money to buy the in-game purchasable currency called Bukkits to be able to purchase your favorite items even quicker.

There are special limited time events that have limited timed items that are available for purchase to keep even after the event is over. Some events include a limited time map that you can only play during the special events as well!

You can host custom private matches with your friends or practice on your own and test your skills against some bots!

name: Arcadegeddon
summary: Rise up and play with up to three friends in this ever-evolving cooperative multiplayer shooter. Explore multiple biomes, mini games, find hidden chests, and defeat numerous enemies and bosses.

name: PEWPEW
summary: PEWPEW is a fun 2d platformer shooter game currently in development where you complete levels fight bosses and shoot up enemies with all different types of weapons.

name: Project Crucible
summary:
Project Crucible Is based very loosely on the Cancelled Russian F2P Game Halo Online It was eventually modified and rebuilt from the ground up to be free of any reliance on original Cache Files or Code. Under Loose Microsoft Approval this Game is Quietly Being Developed and is intended to be an Open Source Halo Sandbox for anyone who Legally owns Halo The Master Chief Collection.

Project Crucible © Microsoft Corporation. Project Crucible was created by Gungnir Studios under Microsoft's "Game Content Usage Rules" using assets from Halo, and Project Crucible is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft.

name: Aton
summary:
A 1 vs. 1 Multiplayer Tower Defense/Offense Game with elements of Deck-Building.
It's a one-man indie game by bluewingtitan/Dominik Mezler and currently known to be in Alpha.

name: Slayers, Inc.
summary: Slayers, Inc. is a roguelite twin-stick shooter about killing hordes of demons. Acquire items to brutalize them in new and unique ways, empower yourself with Artifacts to kill 'em with style, don't forget to keep your combo going, and give those infernal fools the boot!

name: Hair Bows
summary: A narrative platformer in a bizarre world where you have to use the power of your Hair Bow to solve puzzles and defeat your enemies, by activating, manipulating and controlling things on enviroment.

name: Lostria
summary: Lostria is a competitive tactical game in a fantasy world. Compete against other players across the world in turn-based matches and collect characters to build you best team and climb the ladder.

name: Blub Emporium
summary: Blub Emporium is a dense isometric shop manager that gives you access to the entire production chain. Gather resources from the wilderness then build factories to produce the things you sell. Collect tonnes of unique items, decorate everything, complete puzzles, and so much more!

name: AQ First Contact
summary:
Become a commander and join the forces in AQ: First Contact.

AQ is a fully cross platform mmo allowing you to fight alongside or against your friends in real time 3v3 battles. Or take the fight to pirate corporations, destroy the Red Sun and capture Night Raven bases, but watch out for Xeno invasions as you explore the galaxy!

Mine for resources, Salvage debris for new tech and research or just destroy everything and take what you want by force. Explore asteroid belts, gas clouds and nebulas to find resources and new activities.

Join a Corporation, declare war or forge alliances, bombard outposts and capture sectors. Build defense hangers and shield generators to defend, or just go for extra resources and build some asteroid mines.

name: Low Light Combat
summary: Low Light Combat is a free competitive multiplayer shooter where light is your only weapon. Matches take place during a rapidly changing day and night cycle, meaning your fast paced fights quickly become tense and thrilling battles of wit. In LLC, your health, ammo, and stamina are all tied to a single resource: Time. That means everything from firing your weapon and taking damage, to sprinting and shining your flashlight will all deplete your time. To replenish your time you must either defeat other players, or touch the reactor found in the middle of the map. But you must act fast because time... is fleeting.

name: SunnySide
summary:
SunnySide is a JRPG "Slice of Life" Farming Simulation game currently in development by RainyGames with Unreal Engine 4. Its focus is to modernize the classic farming game genre by bridging the gap between tradition and technology, while also highlighting human individuality and harmony.

In SunnySide, your phone is your constant companion while you revive the new farmland you purchased in a local auction. Use it to keep in touch with friends, check on your plants and animals back home, access online shopping, and even store your favorite recipes. Use your time to get to know the new and old residents of SunnySide, learn how to create and maintain a thriving farm and homestead, cook, craft, breed animals, search through mines, and even help a new friend rediscover his old home. Enjoy all the wonders of Japanese landscapes while discovering yourself and the world around you.

name: The Rebellion
summary: The Rebellion is a bold new take on real-time strategy that enables you to command from above and also seamlessly transition to 3rd person to join your warriors on the battlefield. Secure absolute victory by outfitting your army, harvesting resources, and waging all-out war in this dark divided empire.

name: The Hero We Need
summary: The Hero We Need is a tower defense with real-time strategy elements with a focus on narrative where players have the power to create their own custom towers by crafting and combining runes.

name: eFootball
summary: A new brand identity for a new generation of consoles and players, eFootball represents a fresh approach for the long-running franchise. Overhauled graphics, animations and gameplay signal a new era of virtual football. Available free-to-play and completely rebuilt in Unreal Engine.

name: Frigid
summary: Hunt, build, craft and survive an apocalyptic arctic environment and unravel the mystery of a strange virus that is infecting the local wildlife. Inspired by The Thing!

name: Alice Closet
summary: Anime-styled dress-up game with character design and assets created by renowned mangaka Arina Tanemura.

name: Genfanad
summary: An Indie MMORPG inspired by classic MMOs and smashing tropes together.

name: Age of Darkness: Final Stand
summary: Age of Darkness: Final Stand is a dark fantasy survival RTS where you must illuminate, build and defend humanity’s last bastion against hordes of Nightmares. Set in the remnants of a kingdom consumed by a deadly fog, you decide. Will you hide in the light? Or take back your world.

name: GrappleShot
summary: GrappleShot is a fast-paced movement FPS about using a grappling gun used to swing around the map and gain lots of speed. Depending on the class you pick, you can have an assault rifle, shotgun, or sniper rifle, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.

name: Keyword: A Spider's Thread
summary: Become an investigator in Keyword, a narrative thriller where you’ll depend on skills of logical deduction, hacking, and social engineering to solve challenging puzzles as the only means of finding your missing daughter.

name: JollyWorld
summary: Create the most decapitating levels with treacherous terrain and blood-spilling obstacles for you and your friends to ride and play through.

name: Broken Ranks
summary: In this brutal world, filled with the clash of weapons and roars of powerful, dark creatures, many heroes fell and their names were cast into oblivion. Use your chance. Show your mettle and aid others in their quest for glory. Together with your friends, unite the broken ranks against your enemies in one of the most fascinating MMORPGs of this generation.

name: Zombie Army 4: Dead War - Mission 9: Return to Hell
summary: This is the third and final mission in Return to Hell, a horrifying three-part Zombie Army 4: Dead War campaign! Explore the realm of the damned in this new 1-4 player mission, complete with horrifying enemies, collectibles and more! You’ve come this far, but can you live through hell itself?

name: SpacePort Arcade
summary: SpacePort (SPC) is arcade style game similar to Galaga paired with the Binance Smart Chain via the SPC token. Non-SPC holders have the chance to win daily jackpots which can be hundreds or even thousands of dollars by having the highest score of the day. The game is free to play, holders passively earn tokens by playing, and holds regularly scheduled competition events to reward players with more SPC. Holders can also earn NFTs when they win daily high scores in game. Free players are limited to only winning high score jackpot earnings but cannot win NFTs.

name: Moons of Ardan
summary: Moons of Ardan is a city-building and management game where you rebuild and expand your civilization across moons in a real-time simulated planetary system.

name: Skye
summary: A hyper-realistic survival game set on the isle of Skye during the Viking period. Washed ashore you will fight both the elements and the island's natural predators for survival in a bid to find out how you came to be upon its shores.

name: Clunky Hero
summary: A story-driven platformer metroidvania with a touch of RPG and tons of humor! Made in 2.5D, with beautiful hand-drawn-looking backgrounds crowded with funny creatures. Join Rufus, the clunky hero with broom and bucket, on a journey full of surprises through a bizarre realm.

name: Sky Warriors: Blazing Clouds
summary: Fly & fight with war jets! Join the Sky Warriors today and become an ace pilot! Experience the thrill of realistic aerial battles and engaging enemies in adrenaline-packed 3D dogfights!

name: Find Love or Die Trying
summary: Date or die in this Battle Royale Dating Sim Visual Novel!

name: Rhythium
summary: Rhythium is an intense, high-tempo rhythm game with challenging combo-based gameplay. With a classic 4 key system along with an amazing range of original indie electronic music.

name: Everdale
summary: Grow your village and lead your villagers to establish a peaceful, prosperous community in Everdale, a simulation mobile game.

name: SCP: Nine-Tailed Fox
summary:
Experience the horrors of being the one supposed to be in control amidst seemingly unsalvagable chaos.

You are a leader of Foxtrot Unit 1 "Nine-Tailed Fox", a highly trained force tasked with re-containing a multitude of terrifying anomalous monsters that have broken loose inside of a top-secret research facility.

SCP: Nine-Tailed Fox is a free survival horror game, based on SCP - Containment Breach. The events of the game take place in a containment site of The SCP Foundation, a secret organization dedicated to containing and researching anomalous artifacts and entities referred to as SCPs that threaten the normalcy of the world. Whenever things go wrong a highly specialized Mobile Task Force is always at the ready to quickly and effortlessly restore order, but what if the scale of chaos exceeds anything ever seen before?

name: Dogemon
summary:
Combine the AR Playing Experience with your Favourite Dogemons!
Start catching Dogemons today & If you’re a great trainer, you can find Rewards as prey among other Dogemons.
The Dogemons are waiting for you - Start Now and catch them all!
Mars is the Target!

name: Hay Day Pop
summary:
Welcome to Hay Day Pop, the latest puzzle game from the creators of Hay Day!

POP through puzzles, harvest crops and build the farm of your dreams!

Solve puzzles, complete farm tasks, and breathe new life into the land. But building your dream farm won’t be that easy! Puff, Inc.’s industrial operation has clogged the sky with smog.

Clear up the smog to expand your farm, find lush land for crops, and discover more buildings to restore. The more smog you clear, the more chances you’ll get to unlock new decorations and animals!

Solve puzzles to get farm energy! Match two or more puzzle pieces to form explosive boosters and create clever combos. The bigger the match, the better the boost! Every puzzle you complete gets you a step closer to building your dream farm.

Use your farm energy to harvest crops and sell them to visitors to earn coins! Use coins to uncover new areas and upgrade your farm. Level up to unlock endless possibilities to repair, design and customize your slice of paradise!

Populate your farm with cute cows, buzzing bumblebees, plump piggies and more!

While you’re not hard at work on the farm, meet your neighbours and make new friends! Join a neighbourhood and complete deliveries with your friends to reap even bigger rewards. See who has the best farm around!

Every month brings a new season and with each new season comes fresh puzzles popping fun! New game pieces, levels and decorations are just around the corner.

Legend-dairy puzzles and farming await in Hay Day Pop!

name: Mega Monster Party
summary:
Mega Monster Party is a classic multiplayer board game and minigame collection by AirConsole, perfect for passing time and ending friendships!
Players use their smartphones as gamepads to control one of eight monstrous characters and conquer the board.

Choose paths wisely, use secret items to gain advantage and stock up on coins by winning PvP minigames. Once you have the funds, find the Board Master and trade coins for monster minions to get ready for the multiplayer final battle.

name: Battle Wave 2323
summary: Battle Wave 2323 empowers users to become owners in a DeFi-based social gaming economy, and earn real money. Win $ANRX through weekly battles and determine the fate of the AnRKey X Universe.

name: Home Game
summary: Home Game is about the hermit at home. Explore town, find ways into buildings, die horribly, fail utterly, cash cans for change, regret your decisions in life. The game features magic spells, a cat, rude people, demons and death. You can pass through solid objects. You can help end this world. You may grow flowers in your garden, as well as feed birds. It has rain SFX.

name: Phantom Hysteria
summary:
Phantom Hysteria thrusts you into the ghost hunting genre with the team at P.I.N.E. (Paranormal Investigation and Neutralization Experts). Play solo or co-op with up to four players, where you will take on contracts as one of six P.I.N.E. investigators. Hone your skills for your designated class, utilize an array of equipment to decipher your clues, and identify your contracted apparition.

Choosing from a variety of vast indoor and outdoor maps, you and your team will be required to do everything you can to communicate with, and document the ghost; if you can manage to banish it, you’ll have a satisfied customer and riches beyond your wildest dreams… But, if you are unsuccessful, something from beyond the mortal coil may be waiting to enter our dimensional plane.

name: Moe Can Change: Me & MyRoid
summary:
Create your very own robotic anime girl and teach her all about the world around her!
Learn together, work together and spend time together to really get to know your MyRoid.

With a huge variety of clothes and accessories, you can also dress her how you like!
Change her hair, her eyes and even her very personality! Do you like the smoldering, silent type? Or perhaps the energetic, loving type? All these and more, with an ever increasing array!

With this many customizable options, you'll always have a place in your heart for your MyRoid!

name: Aebal
summary: Aebal is a procedural generated rhythm game where your goal is to avoid the red enemies. The more enemies on the board when your hit, the more points you lose. With your own music in this bullet hell, there's nothing but the music to defeat you.

name: Paradise Lust
summary: 2D Point & Click Dating Adventure! Explore an idyllic tropical island with a cast of sexy beauty pageant contestants and their friends, discovering a paradise of survival, romance, and lust.

name: Galactigun
summary: Galactigun is a music rhythm space shooter designed for touch screen devices. Travel through the synthwave torrent, destroying enemy ships to the beat. Use precise timing to accelerate your score and rank.

name: Million on Mars
summary: Million on Mars is an MMO open sandbox city-builder where you decide on your homestead's location, and build out your settlement on the highest-fidelity in-game Mars terrain! Painstakingly created from NASA/JPL topographical data, your location is as close to reality as you can get.

name: Road to Valor: WW2
summary: A Crash Royale Like Strategy Multiplayer Mobile Game set during the 2nd World War

name: Valor Legends: Eternity
summary: Welcome to Valor Legends: Eternity! It's time to embark on your amazing adventure in the Oasis to fight the Shadow forces! Valor Legends: Eternity is a 3D idle game.

name: Coin Treasures
summary:
Coin Treasures is a game like the classic coin pusher/dozer games combined with incremental progress, realistic physics and stunning graphics.

Unlock artifact spawning which will stay in the world after you've won the item. Collect your own treasure room filled with the treasure you find.

Unlock powerfull powerups but be careful this also unlocks power"downs". Try to get them off the play area to avoid temporary penalties. Collecting the powerups will give you temporary benifits.

The aim of the game is to keep upgrading everything.

name: Initial D Arcade Stage 5
summary:
Released on February 25, 2009 in Japan, Initial D Arcade Stage 5 was the second game in the series released on the Sega Lindbergh hardware. A few notable differences include massive physics changes. Compared to Arcade Stage 4/Extreme Stage, which used "drifting" physics, Arcade Stage 5 featured more realistic driving physics, which included tire and brake wear down. Although the tire and brake wear are not displayed anywhere in the game, experienced players can notice the difference in the change in physics as they progress in races.

New characters that appeared for the first time in the game are Kobayakawa, Satoshi Omiya, Imposter Project D, Kai Kogashiwa (R.T. Katagiri S.V.), and Hideo Minagawa. New courses such as Happogahara, which used from Arcade Stage Ver.1 to Arcade Stage Ver.3/Street Stage (only daytime used is night) and only Extreme Stage appeared with full daytimes between day and night and Nagao, R.T. Katagiri S.V.'s home course.

name: The Pioneers: Surviving Desolation
summary: The Pioneers: surviving desolation is a survival/simulation game for PC. You play as a crew of specialists isolated in a space station and trying to survive the climatic and geological threats of Io, the first moon of Jupiter. Customize your space station, manage your vital resources, explore the surrounding area to strategize and complete your mission.

name: Combat Magic: Spells and Swords
summary: This is a 3D third person shooter - slasher game with RPG elements and diverse and complex combat system.

name: The Dark World: Karma
summary: This is a first-person story-driven psychological horror game. Delve into this dark and strange world with an investigation officer from Roam to find traces of lost memories and fulfill your destiny.

name: DodgeBlock
summary:
Experience the terror of rocks falling on a poor mail-man's head, while just trying to do his job.
DodgeBlock is a color text based game in which the player tries to dodge falling Blocks by moving left and right. Usually, the whole game is controlled from the arrow keys. In Normal Mode, collect Bonus Points to get +50 score. Wanna play with a friend? Invite your friend to play on WSAD with Two Player Mode! The half-cooperative dual play version of DodgeBlock. Sadly DodgeBlock is programmed in C# .net framework, so it only works on Microsoft Windows and Android.

name: Ragnarok Origin
summary: The legendary MMORPG with signature classes and skills. The world of Ragnarok awaits you. The Fantasy life you’ve imagined becomes a reality in the open world mobile MMORPG!

name: Beers and Boomerangs
summary: A VR game where you throw boomerangs at kangaroos that are trying to steal your beer! Cook and bring drinks to your mates, but don't forget to defend your BBQ from those pesky kangaroos!

name: Rewrite+
summary: Rewrite+ is an enhanced game that contains both the original game and Rewrite Harvest festa! with entire voiceovers, additional scenes, and much more.

name: Warpath
summary:
Conquer the sky with Jean-Claude Van Damme.

Battle on the ground and in the air in iconic locations around Europe to emerge victorious in this classic real-time strategy game. With an army of advanced aerial units at your fingertips, a new dimension of warfare has opened up to Commanders with intense air to ground combat and devastating precision airstrikes.

Build your forces, and unleash their fury on your foes.

name: Dislyte
summary: Dislyte is a stylish pop-fantasy RPG set in future cities with striking visuals, exuberant beats, and superheroic characters.

name: Phantom Blade: Executioners
summary:
PBEX is an action game proudly presented by S-Game.
A dark epic of KUNGfUPUNK.
Endless combat styles.
Compromises and confrontations.
Bring everything to an end in this fateful duel!

name: Alphabet
summary: Originally available only to select Kickstarter backers, A͈L͈P͈H͈A͈B͈E͈T͈ is a slapstick marathon footrace for 1- to 26-players from Keita Takahashi and Adam Saltsman. Run, jump, eat, sing, poop, and sleep through silly obstacle courses!

name: No More Heroes 1 & 2
summary: Burn rubber through the coastal city of Santa Destroy on Travis' motorbike, the Schpeltiger! Unlock a devastating arsenal of pro wrestling moves from Power Bombs to Brain Busters. Unleash the powerful Dark Side to mow down the competition and show em who's boss! Dual wield beam katanas as Travis Touchdown to dial the hack and slash insanity up to 11! Jump through combat as the agile Shinobu or leave foes in the dust as Travis’ brother, Henry. Experience a blast from the past by playing 8 bit minigames to earn money and power up!

name: Kill Spree
summary: First-person mayhem in grand stadiums.

name: SuperStar ATEEZ
summary: SuperStar ATEEZ is a mobile gacha style rhythm-game focused around the hit 4th gen kpop group ATEEZ. It is part of Dalcom Soft's series of rhythm-games known as SuperStar. It is a sister game to SuperStar SMTOWN, SuperStar JYPNATION, SuperStar STARSHIP, SuperStar WOOLLIM, SuperStar GFRIEND, SuperStar YG, SuperStar FNC, SuperStar KANGDANIEL, The SuperStar, SuperStar P NATION, and the now retired SuperStar BTS.

name: Loot.io
summary:
Get ready for an unforgiving adventure in this addictive 2D rogue-lite shooter right in your browser! Fight enemies to gather the finest loot in the land. Be prepared to inevitably die… over and over and over. Return to the Hub World with the loot you earned, customize your playstyle, invite friends (if you have any), and try again! Death is temporary... Loot is forever.

LOOT is a multiplayer 2D rogue-lite shooter with an action-RPG combat style and rhythm. Fight through hordes of monsters in different biomes to collect that sweet, sweet loot! Satisfy all your inner loot goblin needs directly from your web browser!

name: CryptoMines
summary: CryptoMines is a SciFi play-to-earn NFT game designed to provide the users with a fun experience by collecting Workers and Spaceships to travel through the universe searching for $ETERNAL, this mineral allows them to live another day and make some profits along the way.

name: Peril
summary: An online multiplayer co-op escape room experience where you must use your wits, skills, and speed to escape your peril. Escape rooms include Halloween dungeon, saving Christmas, robbing a bank, escaping a zombie horde, and destroying a dungeon demon. Grab your friends and join the fun!

name: BitLife DE
summary:
How will you live your BitLife?

Will you try to make all the right choices in an attempt to become a model citizen sometime before you die? You could marry the love of your life, have kids, and pick up a good education along the way.

Or will you play choices that horrify your parents? You could descend into a life of crime, fall in love or go on adventures, start prison riots, smuggle duffle bags, and cheat on your spouse. You choose your story...

Discover how bit by bit life choices can add up to determine your success in life the game.

Interactive story games have been around for years. But this is the first text life simulator to truly mash up and simulate adult life.

name: Ilum
summary: Action open-world game that includes elements of exploration. Taking place in ancient Babylon and the surrounding region, including cities like Borsippa, Sippar, Kutha and Kish, among others. The year is 539 BC, the time when the Babylonian empire feel to the Persians and its Jewish captives released from servitude after 70 years. As prophesied, Babylon is to be destroyed. Ilum accurately depicts archaeological findings and cuneiform inscriptions from buildings such as the Tower of Babel, Hanging Gardens and Nebuchadnezzar's palaces. Voice-acted in Akkadian language in a Biblical and Babylonian mythological background.

name: Welcome to Goodland
summary:
This is the police + Ozark TV Show = Welcome to Goodland

An ordinary salaryman is forced to work under a merciless Mexican cartel. Stay alive for as long as you can, get enough money for your new bosses, make tough decisions, acquire businesses and find allies you can trust. But in this cutthroat world, will you be able to keep to your humanity?

name: Honkai: Star Rail
summary: Honkai: Star Rail is an all-new strategy-RPG title in the Honkai series that takes players on a cosmic adventure across the stars. Hop aboard the Astral Express and experience the galaxy's infinite wonders on this journey filled with adventure and thrill.

name: Star Ocean: The Divine Force
summary: Star Ocean: The Divine Force is the next installment in the Star Ocean series. The game features a story that blends sci-fi and fantasy, a rich lineup of characters and side stories, a battle system delivering exhilarating combat with easy controls, and more. The “Double Hero” system returns in which the story spanning the stars and beyond will unfold from the perspective of each protagonist, one from an advanced civilization (sci-fi) and the other from an underdeveloped planet (fantasy). Events that unfold throughout the story as well as the ally characters you end up with will differ based on the protagonist the player chooses.

name: Sanctuary
summary: Sanctuary is a Simulated-Projectile Real Time Strategy game set far in the future on a Dyson Sphere. Three factions vie for power on what could be a prosperous utopia but is instead a constant battleground. Players take command of thousands of units on large battlefields

name: Gachaminer
summary: Gachaminer is a Crypto Mining MMORPG. Learn about Mining and Crypto in Storylines and Missions, and play with thousands of other players in a persistent multiplayer world.

name: Traitors in Salem
summary: Social deduction game from the creators of Town of Salem, BlankMediaGames

name: Sker Ritual
summary: The co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning occult horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

name: Ultimate Golf!
summary: Ultimate Golf! It's a free online multiplayer sports simulator with a fun race to the pin: Do not wait for the opponent to swing and shot. In our golf club, you can perfect your swing, drive, chip and putt from an endless variety of lies on the fairway and greens and become a golf master.

name: Smelogs Playground
summary: Smelogs Playground is a Free-to-Play Real-Time Strategy game with charming aesthetics and a simple but effective gameplay mechanism. Take over the playful and rocky Smelogs to compete against each other for fun and honor!

name: Herios
summary: Herios is an online collectible card game. It will be available on Steam for Windows/Mac and in a second time on Android and Ios. The game is turn-based, single or multiplayer, and is based on the folklore of the Toria universe through its card's illustrations as well as with the atmosphere of its medieval tavern.

name: Zero Sievert
summary: ZERO Sievert is a post apocalyptic game. Explore procedurally generated maps, loot and complete missions.

name: Transformers: Tactical Arena
summary: Enter the fray in ranked 1-on-1 card-based realtime arena battles against live opponents, a friend (via host or invite), or in unranked AI practice battles (also available offline) in this IAP/microtransaction-free, ad-free Apple Arcade exclusive title playable on Mac, iOS, and iPadOS (in either portrait or landscape mode) featuring nearly 2 dozen characters (including voice actors, sound effects, and animations) from Hasbro’s Transformers amongst nearly 50 playable cards each of which can reach level 8 upgraded by currency earned through wins, with cards and other resources awarded randomly by loot crates for the victor.

name: Figure Fantasy
summary: The first 3D idle figurine mobile game, Figure Fantasy has arrived in style! Here, you'll become the figurines' master, and experience a wonderful adventure in their miniature world.

name: Mythic Heroes
summary:
Dark forces threaten the fate of the world, but you are not alone!
Summon an army of unique Gods and Heroes from distinct cultures to create your own elite team.
You can then enhance their abilities with powerful new skills, unlock their iconic weapons, and strengthen them for epic battles.
Your game will even collect rewards while you are AFK to help you save the realm!
